summary: The agent report was generally accurate but missed some key elements related to CM and specific metrics. The causal chain and reasoning were logical but incomplete, and the suggested actions were practical.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent identified DDR and MMDVFS as root causes but missed the CM (CPU Manager) aspect.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain from DDR to VCORE was captured, but the CM to CPU link and SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 mechanisms were not mentioned.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics were correctly identified, but some specific VCORE percentages were missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical but did not fully explore the role of MMDVFS and CM.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fixes were practical and aligned with historical fixes.
